General.Name: Sai Gon Thuong Tin Commercial Joint Stock Bank
General.Description: Saigon Thuong Tin Commercial Joint Stock Bank provides various banking products and services to individual and corporate clients. The company offers current and savings accounts, and term deposits; business, consumer, unsecured, and special loans, as well as SME loans and current account overdrafts; foreign exchange and structured, transfer, remittance, retail bond, and other services; life and non-life insurance; business accounts and services; and cash management services. It also provides supply chain financing and international settlement services; Internet and mobile banking services; debit and credit cards; hedging and investment solutions; FDI customer; and guarantee services. In addition, the company engages in mobilizing capital and leasing activities; manufactures and trades in gold and jewelry, as well as retails gold, silver, precious stones, and jewelry; and offers commercial inspection, asset management, and securities and long-term investment services. It operates branches and transaction offices in Vietnam. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
